website_summaries.verdict: A great value on a colorful, portable tabletop fireplace.
pros: Comes in a variety of colors
Produces 2000 BTUs, enough to heat a 250 square foot room
Good source of light and heat for tabletops
cons: Only burns about 45 minutes before you have to let it cool to refill it
Buying a long, thin funnel for refilling is recommended
Some units arrive with scratches or broken parts

customer_reviews.title: Lots of heat!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for what it is... do not waste money on the bottles of fuel.. you can buy the alcohol by the gallon at most paint stores and all Home Depot’s ..
customer_reviews.author: Ferdo

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this. It’s been in my cart almost 6 months. It’s the perfect size for a table top fire to add ambiance and a tiny bit of warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would like this. I ended up throwing it away. It's more trouble than its worth. Bought to use outside on the patio table. I didn't like the design. It's difficult to set the glass on with the rocks in place. If you set the glass first and pour the rocks they bounce everywhere. I didn't like the size of the rocks. I thought they could be bigger. Less to pick up when they spill everywhere. The fuel is expensive. Can't use cheap alternative fuel. Has to be alcohol so there is no soot.
customer_reviews.author: aaron gunyon

customer_reviews.title: Cute and awesome
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly on my out door table top. It actually warms up the backyard area. It is cute. It cools down fast so you can pour more fluid and light over again. The flame lasts for a decent amount of time. Make sure you use the long lighters or you may singe your fingers. I also suggest using a funnel to fill so you don't splash the flammable liquid everywhere. Love this and will buy a bigger one at some point
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Sabeckis

customer_reviews.title: No assembly directions
customer_reviews.text: Ive never had a tabletop fireplace before so I needed some directions. I don't know if the cottony stuff is supposed to stay in the part where (I guess¿) the fuel goes. And what is the part with a pedestal and stem? Where the **** does it go?? I only found ridiculous warnings in the box, like don't drink the fuel and light it in your mouth.....seriously 🙄. It may be on its way back to Amazon soon.
customer_reviews.author: Aptly named

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a pain to use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a fire pot that had literally burned out. Smaller than I thought. Easy to assemble, but you have to take the glass off every time you fill it. The glass never wants to set properly on the edges that have been infiltrated by the small, white, chalky stones. You can cure this by buying glass “rocks” at the dollar stool. We are keeping it because it was at a decent price point, but there has to be a better and less expensive unit out there.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tabletop Firepit
customer_reviews.text: The perfect tabletop firepit for indoor or outdoor use. Filling the pot (it comes with an absorbent wrap around wick material) lets you enjoy the fire for about 1 1/2 to 2 hours. The bottom metal piece is lightweight and hollow so it fits easily over an umbrella hole and stopper. It produces heat, but not at all overwhelming. It really looks beautiful as it gets darker outside. There are no odors or smoke or residue that builds up on the glass. I didn't use all the while little pebbles provided, just enough to cover decoratively.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as stated. Works great. Flames do go above glass so stay with it. I might have overfilled, 1st time used. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate G Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Rocks fall into wick
customer_reviews.text: So here's my problem...it came with tiny white rocks(a couple of them were green for whatever reason), I used the bag of rocks. The rocks constantly fall into the center wick piece. I had to go buy other rocks for it so that they dont fall into the center. I liked the price and function of this but honestly I wish I had bought a different one with a better setup.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit. Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Beautiful. But hard to load the rocks, and hard to explain why.
customer_reviews.author: Wardy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It's so easy to use i miss the fire place at my mom's house watching this brings back so many great memories i don't use the gravel it kept falling in the fule tank holder i wish i bought this sooner
customer_reviews.author: Karlton

customer_reviews.title: Fire alarm went off because it was a small room
customer_reviews.text: I love it for ambiance and it really does warm up fast... not recommended for small spaces
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Order fuel right away, you don’t get any with the fireplace.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tabletop fireplace for my table on the front porch. My wife and I like to sit there in t he evenings when the Oregon winter weather get to wet to sit on the patio. The fireplace adds a “campfire”, feel to the front porch that will break up the long dark evenings of winter.
customer_reviews.author: GreggA

customer_reviews.title: Creates that fireplace feel,  but only lasts an hour.
customer_reviews.text: It definitely give you the feel of a fireplace. The only thing that I dont like is that it only lasts for an hour. Wish it lasted longer! I added my own rocks. They're were too small.
customer_reviews.author: KSob

customer_reviews.title: Hypnotizing flicker indoors
customer_reviews.text: I love the indoor campfire flicker! I wish it lasted longer, but I guess larger models would. It does put off some heat, but I haven’t had a power outage to really test it for a heat source.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Harper

customer_reviews.title: Great when doesn’t come broken 5x
customer_reviews.text: It came broken about 5 times. Not sure if it was this order or on my girlfriend’s account but there is not enough protection to keep it from breaking. Order well in advanced so can return if broken. Once get a good one, it works well. Doesn’t come with oil but I knew that. Just know that ahead of time and prepare.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Manor

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it! Save your money and time!
customer_reviews.text: First, before you purchase - there is a 20% restocking fee id you decide to return, plus the seller has to “approve” your request to return. You can also NOT ship back the fuel that goes with this item. Secondly, this item looks great but once you put it together it needs to sit flat. If you try to move it the insert in the center comes out the bottom. Either the item is missing a piece or it’s made poorly. Keeping for the shear fact that they will take more of my money for me to send it back! DONT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: It’s gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: So it didn’t come with any instructions on how to put it together/fill/light/ anything. So that was alittle discouraging at first but once i figured it out and did some research I can honestly say I’m SO happy with my purchase. The fuel is alittle expensive but the flame burns beautifully. It’s actually pretty warm too. Perfect for a night on the deck
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it, well made so easy to use. I crank it up every night.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Madden Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom for her upgraded patio area and it was a hit! Creates a mesmerizing and beautiful ambiance. I later bought one for my boyfriend’s mothers or Christmas because my mom liked hers so much . Makes a great gift! Nice fire pit without the work and mess and fits perfectly on a coffee table
customer_reviews.author: hayley b.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the overall use of the product
customer_reviews.text: Maybe my expectations were too high for this product. The actual flame produced by the gel fuel is minimal and the use is limited. Also, I bought a 12 pack of the gel fuel as the unit does not come with any fuel so I have alot of extra fuel to use up. I would not buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Creates a perfect ambience!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect piece for creating a lovely ambience when you don't really want or need to light the fire pit. It looks expensive and I can't wait to use it at my next party on the patio. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Schue

customer_reviews.title: NOT ACCURATE
customer_reviews.text: This product looks nothing like the pictures when it comes to the base. Rather than a shiny, black base it's a dull, dark grey base that collects dust and scratches easily. I'm actually stuck with this product, too, because the seller charges a 20% restocking fee and doesn't use Amazon for their return process so shipping the return is out of pocket and does not get reimbursed. Shameful.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: This is very beautiful. The flame reflects off the glass to enhance the flame. Great price too
customer_reviews.author: keahnyb

customer_reviews.title: Invisible flame
customer_reviews.text: The flame does not get as high as the picture. You really can't see any flame. Nothing to see.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep your $40
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. Probably will just throw it in the trash instead of risking it burning down my apartment. I wish I didnt already buy the fuel. And the bag holding the pebbles broke in transit creating quite the mess when I opened the box upon receipt. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Midtown John

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Nice for our needs and worked better than I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: FlamingArrow

customer_reviews.title: Flame only lasts one hour
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look but would not buy again or recommend it, only lasts one hour, went out right in the middle of dinner on the patio
customer_reviews.author: Maurice S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting an outside fire table, this will work until then. Fluid does burn fast so order enough. Great purchase I use mine on my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for what it is but you only have to get one
customer_reviews.text: It makes my man cave feel cozy and gives a bit of heat too. Everyone who comes over loves it
customer_reviews.author: John Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Change the rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tabletop fireplace. It is visually stunning and easy to operate. It was also easy to assemble. However, I wish the rocks were bigger they were a pain when trying to place the glass cylinder on top. Overall, I Love the product and will purchase a couple more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Deidra

customer_reviews.title: Very unique
customer_reviews.text: This was for my wife's birthday. This is different than the one her friend has, rectangular. She likes this a ton. Very nice, nice flame, compact. Glass gets hot,dah there's a flame. Wait to cool before refilling. Lasts about 80 minutes Worth every dime.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. first one came broken. Difficult time getting replacement from seller. Had to jump thru hoops. Skip this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Maraney

customer_reviews.title: Very cool with a great flame
customer_reviews.text: My wife seen this and wanted it, I thought it wouldn't be very good and have little flame but to my surprise it is quite cool it has a great flame and lasts much longer than I thought. I hate to say it but wife was right and we're glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Capa

customer_reviews.title: They looked just like the photos
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these as a house warming gift and they were so well recieved! They looked just like the photos! Such a cool accessory for indoors or out!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Spriestersbach

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table addition
customer_reviews.text: I loved this so much I hard to buy another one! The first one got taken out in some crazy winds. My bad & big mess but really had to have another one!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Bellistri

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: I will not use it until this Spring. It will be incorporated into a sculpture that is being fabricated. The sculptor and I believe it will work well.
customer_reviews.author: Big Al

customer_reviews.title: Review of Indoor and outdoor Regal Flame Ventless Fire Place
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of the product very much. It looks quite slick and not very bulky to move from one place to another. I found it to be very safe, useful and user-friendly. I would recommend it as safe and valuable for anyone looking for a quick and easy to use and portable heater.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie S Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money for such a unique centerpiece. Shipping was super fast, and arrived ahead of schedule. Little difficult to figure out how to set up at first (had the base upside down initially), but once I figured that out it was smooth sailing. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Guillotte

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, wish it held more fuel to burn longer
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Beautiful flame. Our guests always comment how pretty it is when lit. Only drawback is that it doesn’t hold much fuel therefore the flame doesn’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: Billy M.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: This regal flame is great. Excellent for the the winter and a very elegant piece to add to your living room or bedroom. I am very happy about it. And my guests love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: fausto Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product, wish I got the bigger one to have more of an ambiance
customer_reviews.author: VTmom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect table top fire pit warmed the room almost immediately. Beautiful to look at
customer_reviews.author: Diana R.

customer_reviews.title: Requires fuel sold separate
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for price. Pretty at night. Cindy Sharpsburg, GA
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good outdoor light with heat
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a Christmas gift. I was told that there was a slight learning curve regarding flame height and fuel, but works great.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Regal flame
customer_reviews.text: It works like they say until a light wind blows it out. It also looks better now I changed the stones to blue to match everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table top accent
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. Only down side is if you remove the chimney to add fuel the decorative stone gets in the way to replace it. Long funnel is my option
customer_reviews.author: Chuck R.

customer_reviews.title: It does not come with the fuel.
customer_reviews.text: The hurricane glass is very fragile, need to be sure it is placed on a flat, secure surface. I wish it stated that it didn't come with the fuel. I will be ordering the fuel to see how pretty it is when in use.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Summerour

customer_reviews.title: How perfect it is
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect addition to my outdoor living space. We love it
customer_reviews.author: AEGost

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift giving item!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept and great for round deck tables. I wish the glass and rocks doesn’t get so black when burning.
customer_reviews.author: Milissa Abbott

customer_reviews.title: It's really not ideal for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful product and works well, however in spite of the description, this is not for out of doors. It doesn't emit enough heat to really be able to use outside.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item, no directions
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and they love it! There are no directions to set up the item which made it a little difficult. It's really cool and warm when it's set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Nice but over priced
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than what I thought but still aww nice product. Think it was overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Samson

customer_reviews.title: I
customer_reviews.text: The glass was broke. I'm pretty sure it was due to shipping but it’s bigger then what you think and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Latasha Wright

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come with everything. I was disappointed I had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: We're very happy with the product it looks beautiful on aura patio ...
customer_reviews.text: My table top sale place ship very quickly. We're very happy with the product it looks beautiful on aura patio table. Look forward to purchasing from this seller again
customer_reviews.author: Roger Flansburg

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t look like pic
customer_reviews.text: It look cheap and the glass didn’t fit in the stainless steel base it was to small
customer_reviews.author: shady.jennie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nice center piece for my living room. The fireplace provides great ambience and conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: carl applegate III

customer_reviews.title: You need to more about it before purchase
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know that the fuel didn’t come with it
customer_reviews.author: Marie Carter

customer_reviews.title: Product Broken
customer_reviews.text: The glass was broken upon receipt and is currently out of stock and more expensive than when i originally bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Watts

customer_reviews.title: Elegant style
customer_reviews.text: Very simple setup and elegant style. Perfect compliment for my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan S Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Not a good experience.
customer_reviews.text: Product was broken and had to be returned. Gift plan was scrapped causing last minute problem. Not a good experience.
customer_reviews.author: kagillion

customer_reviews.title: beautiful design! Don't hesitate
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for!!! Well made, beautiful design! Don't hesitate, order it, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great mood light
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks beautiful on our patio table.
customer_reviews.author: Alain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the new in door out door fireplace. Vary stylish goes great with my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Great for small tables and small spaces, puts out enough heat and light to create a great atmosphere.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Chappuis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got it in < 2 days. Just as advertised. Very elegant!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tabletop fireplace. I purchased it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great product but don’t be fooled!
customer_reviews.text: Great product but don’t be fooled! Use denatured alcohol with is and don’t buy that over priced fuel. 16.00 will get you 1 gallon of fuel and it works great! Get it at any hardware store!
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Price far exceeds quality
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived partially damaged. Flames are low then high then gone because these don’t last long. The rocks constantly fall into liquid fuel reservoir. I contacted the company to get replacement parts but answered one email then no longer responded. I never got the replacement part. I wouldn’t buy these again and the price far exceeds the product quality and function.
customer_reviews.author: Jason K. Brooke

customer_reviews.title: This small fire pit  is perfect for any tabletop
customer_reviews.text: We had our tabletop fire pit alight last evening and it was magical! It is small and odorless and better than a pillar candle! Our only wish is that the flame would last a bit longer- it burnt for about 45 minutes. Then you have to wait 15 minutes to add more ethanol fuel. Still, better 45 minutes than none! Delightfully delightful!
customer_reviews.author: Comfort shoe aficionado

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to our Dinning Room
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE LOVE LOVE this little fireplace. Fits perfectly on our round dinning room table and really stands out. The fire is somewhat larger than my other ethanol fireplace which was a pleasant surprise. I attribute this to the cylindrical shape of the glass, the fire reaches up to consume more air and as such provides a bigger flame. the one thing I did not like was getting the white gravel done, but we figured out how to make it work :) All in a all an absolute STEAL for the price. Go for it, you know you want too ;)
customer_reviews.author: jbordetas

customer_reviews.title: Glass was broken becareful when opening.
customer_reviews.text: Bought was excited it arrived upon opening of box, and removing items glass was completed shattered. I have several small cuts. I really was looking forward to this item and was displeased.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle experience

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this small table fire pit. Haven’t used it for heating purposes but I love using it when I’m sitting on my patio. The rocks were so small I had to figure out a way to keep them from falling out and they do not fill to the top like displayed. Very peaceful but the gas is hella expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Gerie W

customer_reviews.title: Nice Flames
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my sister hoping that it would look as nice as it does in the photos. When she opened it she was happy of the quality especially when compared next to other at the price range. The flame burns constant creating a beautiful show happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic swasey

customer_reviews.title: No idea how to use?
customer_reviews.text: This came with no instructions on how to fill, what the material in the can is for and how to light the flame? Do you light the liquid, the vapor, what? It's unusable and potentially dangerous without clear instructions!
customer_reviews.author: ArubaDog

customer_reviews.title: Difficult
customer_reviews.text: The fuel cup top is difficult to remove and you can’t see how much fuel you are putting in the up.. The glass globe does not fit in the screw-in devices. Otherwise I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Redhillb

customer_reviews.title: This Regal Flame Eden Ventless Tabletop Portable Bio Ethanol Fireplace is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I just love it! We use it on our outdoor bar area at night. Filling the fuel cup full with Bio Ethanol fuel we get approximately an hour of dancing flames that look awesome. We bought it for a mood setter at night. Just turn up the music, light up this table top fireplace and enjoy the evening. It was packaged well and have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It was a gift for my mom. Nice flame, and got a gallon of denatured alcohol at a big box retailer for less than $9.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B.

customer_reviews.title: I like the ambience this lends to my kitchen (nice to ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the ambience this lends to my kitchen (nice to have concrete counter tops, so I can use this), but it is a little complicated to fill without getting the pebbles all over or falling into the fuel.
customer_reviews.author: WI-Brunner

customer_reviews.title: Good with one issue
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Only issue is if you use the rocks the glass cylinder will not go on right. Design flaw
customer_reviews.author: M. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. the flame is strong and beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received was broken, but they quickly sent me another one. I put it together in less than five minutes. I plan to use it inside, and out. I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: kellie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun fire feature for backyard patio table.Great design and well made!
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice little fire pit great for atmosphere looks really cool in the dark as the flame is more of a blue color
customer_reviews.author: zoom zoom

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this indoor outdoor fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this indoor outdoor fireplace!! I've put it in my gazebo, very cozy and very pretty! Thank you for your his product!!! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice small table top fire bowl, the ethanol I used burned too clean to see the flame in daylight but was very nice to watch the flame dance once it got dark
customer_reviews.author: Matthew H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks great
customer_reviews.text: This tabletop fireplace commands attention, our guests find it mesmerizing while providing significant heat to the room. It's easy to assemble and use.
customer_reviews.author: Red Cloud9

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful flame
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamp. Good size. Soot does cost glass relatively quickly regardless of what you burn.
customer_reviews.author: J klok

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a small outdoor table. Exactly what I needed. I might get more in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hertl

customer_reviews.title: Take paper out of the piece that the lighter fluid goes in!
customer_reviews.text: Love sitting on my Veranda with new tabletop fire pit!! I think it keeps bugs away. YEAH
customer_reviews.author: Donna Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift and it was well received
customer_reviews.author: Allan Dodds

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery, great sales
customer_reviews.text: The Regal Flame Eden Ventless Indoor Outdoor Fire Pit is a perfect size for my table and is a conversational piece.
customer_reviews.author: CharlesC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for both indoors and out 👍!
customer_reviews.text: The fuel is very expensive and a full tank of fuel when burned in the unit doesn't last very long! It works perfect for indoors and out.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: This indoor fireplace is really cool. I love the fact I can have it ...
customer_reviews.text: This indoor fireplace is really cool. I love the fact I can have it on my kitchen table or out on the patio. Only downfall is that it does go thru the fuel rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Warms and lights a room nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Exceleent especially for the price. Its convenient and a little larger than i thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Reck

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect flame for the deck
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect flame for the deck. We wanted a small table fire because we didn't feel comfortable putting a fire pit on the deck. It sits nicely on the table and gives the perfect ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Bought as gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a housewarming gift. The party was held outdoors and everyone loved the firepit. Everyone would just stare at the flames. I loved it so much, I ordered 2 for our patio table.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks nothing like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for an event. They are made of very cheap material. One of them was sanded with a very rough sand paper by hand and, as a result, scratched all over. The other one a bit better but also scratched and has a few dings here and there. Problem is that I also ordered fuel from someone else for them and at this point I don't have time to order another set of something else. Very irresponsible and certainly deceiptful vendor posting misleading product pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Ambitio

customer_reviews.title: Great tabletop accessory
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and gives off a little heat as well as having a great flame.
customer_reviews.author: MP

product_meta.title: Regal Flame Black Eden Ventless Indoor Outdoor Fire Pit Tabletop Portable Fire Bowl Pot Bio Ethanol Fireplace in Black - Realistic Clean Burning Like Gel Fireplaces, or Propane Firepits
product_meta.description: Color:BlackEden Ventless Tabletop Portable Bio Ethanol Fireplace in Black. The Regal Flame black Eden tabletop ethanol fireplace provides a warm, glowing flame that dances and swirls to set an elegant ambiance as a dining table centerpiece indoors or out. The best alternative to Hurricane Candle holders. Regal Flame Ethanol Fireplace Fuel Recommended (not included). Insert Type and Capacity: 1 x .12 Liter Dual Layer Burner made of 304 Stainless Steel. Type: Tabletop Ethanol Fireplace. Use Indoor / Outdoor. Recommend for Condo, Apartment, Family Home, Office, Restaurants and Hotels. What is Included: Fireplace - x1, Ethanol Burner Insert - x1, Damper Tool - x1, Pebbles x1.
feature_bullets: This portable tabletop firepit fireplace requires no electric, gas, chimney or gel cans. Burns Regal Flame ventless ethanol fuel.
